Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.utils.json

Class ElegantAutoLabelingCustomPolymorphicJsonAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.squareup.moshi.JsonAdapter<Object>
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.utils.json.ElegantAutoLabelingCustomPolymorphicJsonAdapter
public class ElegantAutoLabelingCustomPolymorphicJsonAdapter extends com.squareup.moshi.JsonAdapter<Object>
This class is a custom JsonAdapter that allows to serialize and deserialize polymorphic objects It automatically adds a label to the serialized object to identify the subclass The label is the first field of the serialized object
